articles.title: South Africa's illegal 'zama-zama' mining industry: Gang-controlled 'towns' grow underground - BBC.com
articles.description: Illegal miners live dangerously, but make roaring profits selling gold on the black-market.
articles.content: Along with about 600 other men, Ndumiso lives and works in a small gang-controlled "town" - complete with markets and a red light district - that has grown up deep underground at a disused gold mine … [+9956 chars]
